text: Will smart content be supported at some point on rich text inside CMs?
yes, I think they’re working out how to do smart content overall for the whole custom module not just individual fields. every time ive asked though there’s no eta, it’s a tough problem to solve
thanks! and agree, hope they take care of it soon...

been wanting this awhile - can we get a css pane or two for modules designated for email templates.

One that adds the styles to the tag that gets inlined. and one that adds styles to a style tag that is not inlined(for Media Query use)
<@U7SL518D6> the inlined ones are only inlined if they are wrapped in a special html comment
? Not according to the docs. Or the example code when you create a new coded email
You just add the data attribute or the id(depending on the type of template
Regardless theres no reason they couldnt make email modules have a css pane that inlines all the css in it
